verses.verse: And it came to pass in those days <WH3117>, when there was no king <WH4428> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that there was a certain <WH376> Levi <WH3881> sojourning <WH1481> <WH8802> on the side <WH3411> of mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>, who took <WH3947> <WH8799> to him a concubine <WH802> <WH6370> out of Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063>.

And his concubine <WH6370> played the whore <WH2181> <WH8799> against him, and went away <WH3212> <WH8799> from him unto her father's <WH1> house <WH1004> to Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063>, and was there four <WH702> whole months <WH2320> <WH3117>.

And her husband <WH376> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> her, to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> friendly <WH3820> unto her, and to bring her again <WH7725> <WH8687>, having his servant <WH5288> with him, and a couple <WH6776> of asses <WH2543>: and she brought <WH935> <WH8686> him into her father's <WH1> house <WH1004>: and when the father <WH1> of the damsel <WH5291> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> him, he rejoiced <WH8055> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> him.

And his father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802>, the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1>, retained <WH2388> <WH8686> him; and he abode <WH3427> <WH8799> with him three <WH7969> days <WH3117>: so they did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, and lodged <WH3885> <WH8799> there.

And it came to pass on the fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117>, when they arose early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, that he rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to depart <WH3212> <WH8800>: and the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his son in Torah <WH2860>, Comfort <WH5582> <WH8798> thine heart <WH3820> with a morsel <WH6595> of bread <WH3899>, and afterward <WH310> go your way <WH3212> <WH8799>.

And they sat down <WH3427> <WH8799>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> both <WH8147> of them together <WH3162>: for the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1> had said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the man <WH376>, Be content <WH2974> <WH8685>, I pray thee, and tarry all night <WH3885> <WH8798>, and let thine heart <WH3820> be merry <WH3190> <WH8799>.

And when the man <WH376> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to depart <WH3212> <WH8800>, his father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802> urged <WH6484> <WH8799> him: therefore he lodged <WH3885> <WH8799> there again <WH7725> <WH8799>.

And he arose early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242> on the fifth <WH2549> day <WH3117> to depart <WH3212> <WH8800>: and the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Comfort <WH5582> <WH8798> thine heart <WH3824>, I pray thee. And they tarried <WH4102> <WH8701> until afternoon <WH3117> <WH5186> <WH8800>, and they did eat <WH398> <WH8799> both <WH8147> of them.

And when the man <WH376> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to depart <WH3212> <WH8800>, he, and his concubine <WH6370>, and his servant <WH5288>, his father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802>, the damsel's <WH5291> father <WH1>, said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Behold, now the day <WH3117> draweth <WH7503> <WH8804> toward evening <WH6150> <WH8800>, I pray you tarry all night <WH3885> <WH8798>: behold, the day <WH3117> groweth to an end <WH2583> <WH8800>, lodge <WH3885> <WH8798> here, that thine heart <WH3824> may be merry <WH3190> <WH8799>; and to morrow <WH4279> get you early <WH7925> <WH8689> on your way <WH1870>, that thou mayest go <WH1980> <WH8804> home <WH168>.

But the man <WH376> would <WH14> <WH8804> not tarry that night <WH3885> <WH8800>, but he rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> and departed <WH3212> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> over against <WH5227> Jebus <WH2982>, which is Yerushalayim <WH3389>; and there were with him two <WH6776> asses <WH2543> saddled <WH2280> <WH8803>, his concubine <WH6370> also was with him.

And when they were by Jebus <WH2982>, the day <WH3117> was far <WH3966> spent <WH7286> <WH8804>; and the servant <WH5288> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his master <WH113>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, I pray thee, and let us turn in <WH5493> <WH8799> into this city <WH5892> of the Y'vusis <WH2983>, and lodge <WH3885> <WH8799> in it.

And his master <WH113> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We will not turn aside <WH5493> <WH8799> hither into the city <WH5892> of a stranger <WH5237>, that is not of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; we will pass over <WH5674> <WH8804> to Giv`ah <WH1390>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his servant <WH5288>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us draw near <WH7126> <WH8799> to one <WH259> of these places <WH4725> to lodge all night <WH3885> <WH8804>, in Giv`ah <WH1390>, or in Ramah <WH7414>.

And they passed on <WH5674> <WH8799> and went their way <WH3212> <WH8799>; and the sun <WH8121> went down <WH935> <WH8799> upon them when they were by <WH681> Giv`ah <WH1390>, which belongeth to Binyamin <WH1144>.

And they turned aside <WH5493> <WH8799> thither, to go in <WH935> <WH8800> and to lodge <WH3885> <WH8800> in Giv`ah <WH1390>: and when he went in <WH935> <WH8799>, he sat him down <WH3427> <WH8799> in a street <WH7339> of the city <WH5892>: for there was no man <WH376> that took <WH622> <WH8764> them into his house <WH1004> to lodging <WH3885> <WH8800>.

And, behold, there came <WH935> <WH8804> an old <WH2205> man <WH376> from his work <WH4639> out of the field <WH7704> at even <WH6153>, which was also <WH376> of mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>; and he sojourned <WH1481> <WH8804> in Giv`ah <WH1390>: but the men <WH582> of the place <WH4725> were Benjamites <WH1145>.

And when he had lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> a wayfaring <WH732> <WH8802> man <WH376> in the street <WH7339> of the city <WH5892>: and the old <WH2205> man <WH376> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Whither goest <WH3212> <WH8799> thou? and whence <WH370> comest <WH935> <WH8799> thou?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We are passing <WH5674> <WH8802> from Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063> toward the side <WH3411> of mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>; from thence am I: and I went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Beit-Lechemjudah <WH1035> <WH3063>, but I am now going <WH1980> <WH8802> to the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>; and there is no man <WH376> that receiveth <WH622> <WH8764> me to house <WH1004>.

Yet there is <WH3426> both straw <WH8401> and provender <WH4554> for our asses <WH2543>; and there is bread <WH3899> and wine <WH3196> also for me, and for thy handmaid <WH519>, and for the young man <WH5288> which is with thy servants <WH5650>: there is no want <WH4270> of any thing <WH1697>.

And the old <WH2205> man <WH376> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Peace <WH7965> be with thee; howsoever <WH7535> let all thy wants <WH4270> lie upon me; only lodge <WH3885> <WH8799> not in the street <WH7339>.

So he brought <WH935> <WH8686> him into his house <WH1004>, and gave provender <WH1101> <WH8799> unto the asses <WH2543>: and they washed <WH7364> <WH8799> their feet <WH7272>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>.

Now as they were making their hearts <WH3820> merry <WH3190> <WH8688>, behold, the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892>, certain <WH582> sons <WH1121> of B'liya'al <WH1100>, beset <WH5437> the house <WH1004> round about <WH5437> <WH8738>, and beat <WH1849> <WH8693> at the door <WH1817>, and spake <WH559> <WH8799> to the master <WH1167> of the house <WH1004>, the old <WH2205> man <WH376>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Bring forth <WH3318> <WH8685> the man <WH376> that came <WH935> <WH8804> into thine house <WH1004>, that we may know <WH3045> <WH8799> him.

And the man <WH376>, the master <WH1167> of the house <WH1004>, went out <WH3318> <WH8799> unto them, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Nay <WH408>, my brethren <WH251>, nay, I pray you, do not so wickedly <WH7489> <WH8686>; seeing <WH310> that this man <WH376> is come <WH935> <WH8804> into mine house <WH1004>, do <WH6213> <WH8799> not this folly <WH5039>.

Behold, here is my daughter <WH1323> a maiden <WH1330>, and his concubine <WH6370>; them I will bring out <WH3318> <WH8686> now, and humble <WH6031> <WH8761> ye them, and do <WH6213> <WH8798> with them what seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto you: but unto this man <WH376> do <WH6213> <WH8799> not so <WH2063> vile <WH5039> a thing <WH1697>.

But the men <WH582> would <WH14> <WH8804> not hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> to him: so the man <WH376> took <WH2388> <WH8686> his concubine <WH6370>, and brought <WH3318> <WH8686> her forth <WH2351> unto them; and they knew <WH3045> <WH8799> her, and abused <WH5953> <WH8691> her all the night <WH3915> until the morning <WH1242>: and when the day <WH7837> began to spring <WH5927> <WH8800>, they let her go <WH7971> <WH8762>.

Then came <WH935> <WH8799> the woman <WH802> in the dawning <WH6437> <WH8800> of the day <WH1242>, and fell down <WH5307> <WH8799> at the door <WH6607> of the man's <WH376> house <WH1004> where her lord <WH113> was, till it was light <WH216>.

And her lord <WH113> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> in the morning <WH1242>, and opened <WH6605> <WH8799> the doors <WH1817> of the house <WH1004>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799> to go <WH3212> <WH8800> his way <WH1870>: and, behold, the woman <WH802> his concubine <WH6370> was fallen down <WH5307> <WH8802> at the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004>, and her hands <WH3027> were upon the threshold <WH5592>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Up <WH6965> <WH8798>, and let us be going <WH3212> <WH8799>. But none answered <WH6030> <WH8802>. Then the man <WH376> took <WH3947> <WH8799> her up upon an ass <WH2543>, and the man <WH376> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799>, and gat <WH3212> <WH8799> him unto his place <WH4725>.

And when he was come <WH935> <WH8799> into his house <WH1004>, he took <WH3947> <WH8799> a knife <WH3979>, and laid hold <WH2388> <WH8686> on his concubine <WH6370>, and divided <WH5408> <WH8762> her, together with her bones <WH6106>, into twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> pieces <WH5409>, and sent <WH7971> <WH8762> her into all the coasts <WH1366> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And it was so <WH1961> <WH8738>, that all that saw <WH7200> <WH8802> it said <WH559> <WH8804>, There was no such deed <WH2063> done nor seen <WH7200> <WH8738> from the day <WH3117> that the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came up <WH5927> <WH8800> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> unto this day <WH3117>: consider <WH7760> <WH8798> of it, take advice <WH5779> <WH8798>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8761> your minds.
